comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Quote from: sukhichd710 on May 15, 2023, 06:41:29 AMRIPPER !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!1HE Can even rip you for 20-30$ so do not do even a small trade with him.Hey! File a scam accusation to this board https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=83.0.Use this format: Code:[b][color=black]What happened:: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Scammers Profile Link: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Reference Link: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Amount Scammed: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Payment Method: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Proof of Payment: [/color][/b][b][color=black]PM/Chat Logs: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Additional Notes: [/color][/b]It doesn’t matter how small or big the amount as long as the user scam you so that other members will not fall victim on the same scam attempt. There’s a lot of scammer here so I consider your accusation but action will be done once you send proof.Quote from: Kokruu on May 17, 2023, 03:22:59 PMQuote from: sukhichd710 on May 15, 2023, 06:41:29 AMRIPPER !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!1HE Can even rip you for 20-30$ so do not do even a small trade with him.Please don't spread false info! I'm on and stocked, message on discordIf his accusation is not true then why you delete this sell thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5448089.msg62058973#msg62058973 after he post the scam accusation?
